BackstoryDef.title: genetic heir
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was created as an almost identical genetic clone of [PAWN_possessive] mother, altered to be more perfect in every way. [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] childhood coming to terms with the insurmountable expectations placed upon [PAWN_objective].

BackstoryDef.title: clone soldier
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was created as a disposable soldier to fight in a vast interplanetary war.

BackstoryDef.title: clone soldier
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] believed [PAWN_pronoun] had joined their military to fight in a vast interplanetary war. However, [PAWN_nameDef] eventually learned that [PAWN_pronoun] had been created in a lab as a disposable soldier. [PAWN_possessive] memories of [PAWN_possessive] childhood were simulated fabrications, as [PAWN_possessive] creators found this enabled their clones to integrate into military units better.\n\nThe abrupt end of the war cast [PAWN_nameDef] and a legion of other clones into society at large.
